food.pattern:

Visual Style:
Bon App√©tit editorial aesthetic. Warm earth tones with cream and amber highlights. Hasselblad medium format quality.

Steam wisps rising, surfaces glisten with freshness, textures feel tangible, aroma seems to penetrate the frame.

portrait.name: Portrait Photography
portrait.pattern:
{subject}, cinematic portrait.

Visual Style:
Wong Kar-wai and Saul Leiter aesthetics. Deep saturated colors with emotional depth. Shot with 90mm lens, f/1.8, Kodak Vision3 500T film grain.

Lighting & Atmosphere:
Soft side lighting with subtle rim light separation. Dreamy, emotionally evocative mood.

Constraints:
Maintain realistic facial features. Do not alter identity characteristics. Natural skin texture.

product.name: Product Photography
product.pattern:
{subject}, premium advertising photography.

Visual Style:
Hasselblad medium format quality. Apple-style product aesthetics. Clean, minimal, premium feel.

Composition:
Floating composition on seamless background. 100mm lens, f/8, high dynamic range.

Lighting:
High-key studio lighting with soft shadows. Rim light for edge separation.

Constraints:
Product must not be distorted. No text or watermarks. Maintain accurate proportions.

cinematic.name: Cinematic Scene
cinematic.pattern:
{subject}, cinematic film still.

Visual Style:
Christopher Doyle cinematography. Cinestill 800T color palette. 35mm anamorphic lens, 2.39:1 aspect ratio feel.

Lighting:
Volumetric light with atmospheric haze. Chiaroscuro contrast. Practical light sources visible.

Atmosphere:
Cinematic tension and mood. Environmental storytelling.

Constraints:
Maintain cinematic color grading. No flat lighting.

3d.name: 3D Icon/Render
3d.pattern:
{subject}, soft 3D render.

Style:
Claymorphism aesthetic. Soft, tactile materials. Blender/C4D quality rendering.

Composition:
3x3 grid layout on pure white background. Consistent lighting direction.

Materials:
Subtle subsurface scattering. Ambient occlusion for depth. Soft studio lighting.

Constraints:
No text. Clean edges. Consistent style across all elements.

japanese.name: Japanese Aesthetic
japanese.pattern:
{subject}, Japanese aesthetic.

Visual Style:
Wabi-sabi aesthetics. MUJI visual language. Muted, desaturated palette with soft cream and sage tones.

Lighting:
High-key, diffused natural light. Minimal shadows. Soft, breathing quality.

Composition:
Generous negative space (Ma). Simple, intentional arrangement. Quiet minimalism.

Constraints:
No high-saturation colors. No cluttered elements. Maintain serene, contemplative mood.

poster.name: Design Poster
poster.pattern:
{subject}, graphic design poster.

Visual Style:
Swiss International Style principles. Bold geometric forms. Limited color palette (3 colors maximum).

Layout:
Strong grid system. Clear typographic hierarchy. Intentional negative space.

Constraints:
Clear information hierarchy. No decorative clutter. Maintain visual rhythm.

app.name: App/UI Mockup
app.pattern:
{subject}, mobile app UI design mockup.

Visual Style:
Modern glassmorphism or soft neumorphism. Clean, minimal interface. Premium tech aesthetic.

Presentation:
Floating device mockup with subtle shadow. Clean gradient or solid background.

Details:
Realistic screen content. Consistent iconography. Professional typography.

Constraints:
No placeholder text. Maintain realistic proportions. Clean, polished finish.
